translations: n.[细胞]吞噬细胞（phagocyte 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 吞噬细胞, 单核吞噬细胞, 在单核吞噬细胞
释义固定噬细胞, 固定噬细胞英语

sentences.sentence: In addition, many phagocytes have other specialized functions.
sentences.translation: 此外，许多吞噬细胞还有其他专门的功能。

sentences.sentence: There are 2 types of phagocytes: mononuclear phagocytes and granulocytes.
sentences.translation: 有2种吞噬细胞：单核吞噬细胞和粒细胞。

sentences.sentence: When we get an infection, white blood cells called phagocytes leap into action.
sentences.translation: 人感染时，机体的白细球吞噬细胞行动起来消除感染。
